section.name: Java Proxy Factory Service
section.p: The JDKProxyFactory service is used to construct a Gaderian service that delegates to a plain Java java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler instance.
The service expects a single parameter elementas shown below:

The value for the service attribute is the service id of the service that will handle the calls to the service interface. The service must implement the InvocationHandler java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler interface and is a required attribute.
